BuyerGroupRelatedObject.name: BuyerGroupRelatedObject
BuyerGroupRelatedObject.description: Used to associate currencies and supported ship-to countries with a buyer group and its price books, promotions, and entitlements. Supports buyer experience when buyer group members shop in stores enabled for multiple locales.

BuyerGroupId.description: Required. ID of the buyer group this record is associated with.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly..

ObjectType.description: Required. The names displayed in the picklist showing the ObjectValues - currency and ship-to countries.

ObjectValues.description: Optional. Values for ObjectType. The actual currency and supported ship-to countries. Possible values are: Three-letter ISO currency code associated with the buyer account or a supported locale. ISO country code for supported ship-to countries.
